text: The city wakes, a symphony of motion, a tapestry of dreams. Love shared, a bond unbreakable, in the heart of our humble home. The quiet hours, dedication whispers, chasing ambitions under the moon's gentle gaze. Innocence dances freely, pure joy echoes, a vibrant melody in the air. Years woven together, a timeless romance, strength found in unwavering unity. Journeys unfold, reflections linger, where does the path lead, what will be? Art takes form, skill shines, a heritage cherished, tradition lives forever. Gathered as one, stories unfold, laughter fills the room, hearts intertwined together. A new dawn awaits, possibilities arise, life's beautiful dance continues, endlessly.
